thread.title_full: TravelCenters Of America Gets Technical At 2015 Expedite Expo

title: TravelCenters Of America Gets Technical At 2015 Expedite Expo
text: TravelCenters Of America Gets Technical At 2015 Expedite Expo By Business Wire | 07/20/15 - 03:05 PM EDT TravelCenters of America LLC, (TravelCenters), operator of TA® and Petro Stopping Centers® branded travel centers, will be at the 2015 Expedite Expo at the Roberts Centre in Wilmington, Ohio, July 24 - 25 th , in booths A4 and A5. Let's Get Technical Expedite Expo attendees will be able to participate in TravelCenters' three "Let's Get Technical" sessions: Friday, July 24, 9:30 am to 10:30 am Smart Maintenance: TA's "Rolling on Through the Season" is amaintenance strategy that includes year round planthat helps you cope with changing seasons. Saturday, July 25, 11:30 am to 12:30 pm Oil and Filters: Current Trend in oil and filtration technology,nanotet technology, oil types and viscosities. Saturday, July 25, 1:30 pm to 2:30 pm Tires: Tires, tire maintenance, tire inflation and alignments. Pre-trip Inspection Challenge Any driver can participate in the "Pre-Trip Challenge" and receive a FREE gift. The driver with the best score will receive 25,000 UltraONE Points. Mid-Trip Inspection Any driver can get a FREE Mid-Trip inspection performed by TA and Petro Stopping Centers highly-skilled, certified technicians in the Roberts Centre Parking Lot by presenting their Expedite Expo show badge. The first 100 Expo attendees who have the Free Mid-Trip inspection will receive a free set of TA and Petro Stopping Centers branded mud flaps. 1 of 2
